section.p: A methodical examination or review of the fluid utilized in the surgical event.

ol.li:
Contains exactly one [1..1] bloodLoss with data type Physical Quantity
Contains the volume of blood loss during the surgical event.

Contains exactly one [1..1] totalUrineOutput with data type Physical Quantity
Contains the total urine output post surgery.
